segments.text: I see the woman is so focused on drying that plate, it's almost funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has no idea what's going on behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just gushing out of the sink, and she's standing in a puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she's ever going to notice it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is being so sneaky, trying to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but laugh at how quiet they're being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they're going to get away with it, at least for now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip, but he seems to have it under control.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't make a mess or wake their mother up from her dish drying trance.
segments.speaker: PAR
